ygData.subject: Re: Gems!
ygData.msgSnippet: LMAO! ... were ... it, ... have ... my ... with ... is ... Camps ... People ... on ... out ... way
ygData.messageBody:
LMAO!

--- In eqbards@y..., "Cranfill, Wendy" <Wendy_Cranfill@m...> wrote:
> Our guild thought you should have a flag over your head when you
were
> playing
> i.e.
>
> Halana Cinderhaze <Paradigm> |slacker|
>
> and then they decided this should be continued in real life:
>
> Wendy Cranfill <Maxtor> |gamerslacker|
>
> :)
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: beatdropbattledrum@h...
> > [mailto:beatdropbattledrum@h...]
> > Sent: Thursday, March 08, 2001 2:27 PM
> > To: eqbards@y...
> > Subject: [eqbards] Re: Gems!
> >
> >
> > Ya, I knew that. Actually, you don't even have to click to pause
it,
> > you can just click done and come back. But, once you log, you
have
> > to start a new game. But why would multiplayer be pointless? In
my
> > mind, they would just make it so you have to start a new game
with
> > another player so that both are starting fresh. I think that it
> > would be fun :)
> >
> > I'm glad that they added Gems. I know a while back, many players
> > were requesting casinos in towns so that they can gamble and play
> > games. They said that it would be too buggy and exploitable
> > possibly, but I think that Gems (and other possible future games)
is
> > a good compromise. The best things I can see about it are...
Camps
> > will become much less boring, when you still have to stare at the
> > spell books with pre-35 casters, waiting for group
> > assignments/buffing on raids, etc. Although, like you said.
People
> > can die if they aren't paying attention and just playing Gems.
> >
> > ~Beatdrop
> >
> >
> > --- In eqbards@y..., "Gordon Hughes" <ghughes@c...> wrote:
> > > You can resume paused games at a later stage. To pause, click
on
> > the game
> > > window, click "done" and go do something else. To resume, type
> > /gems and
> > > click on the paused screen to continue.
> > >
> > > I'm not sure if this works if you re-log.
> > >
> > > Worryingly enough, I saw a group in Karnors almost get wiped
out
> > last night
> > > because their Enchanter was busy playing gems while medding.
> > >
> > > >Why do you keep saying that you can play non stop. I don't
> > > >understand what you are saying. Do you mean that there is a
way
> > >to make
> > > it so the game doesn't reset when you log? I'm >confused.
> >
> >
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
> > lol@r... with the subject submissions.
> >
> > Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to
> http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
